tweet: Fungibility is the only property of sound money that is missing from Bitcoin & Litecoin. Now that the scaling debate is behind us, the next battleground will be on fungibility and privacy.  I am now focused on making Litecoin more fungible by adding Confidential Transactions. 🚀
